Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, reflecting years of innovation and expertise. We are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12000. This opportunity not only presents a remarkable investment but also an unparalleled chance to experience the excellence that our product embodies. We believe this price reflects the true worth and potential benefits it can bring to you. We look forward to discussing how this product can enhance your life or business. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
